#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

#define     s(n)                scanf("%d",&n)
#define     ss(n)               scanf("%s",n)
#define     sc(n)               scanf("%c",&n)
#define     sll(n)              scanf("%lld",&n)
#define     fall(i,a,b)         for(int i=a;i<b;i++)

int main()
{
    char c='s';
    while(c!='\n')
    {
        sc(c);
        if(c=='a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u')
            sc(c),sc(c);
        printf("%c",c);
    }
return 0;
}
